No. 590,

Misc.

Platt v. Texas. William E. Gray, for petitioner. Waggoner. Carr, Attorney General of Texas, Hawthorne Phillips,' First Assistant Attorney General, T. B. Wright, Executive Assistant Attorney General, and Howard M. Fender, and Alio B. Crow, Jr., Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.
